config.value: Organisations that have contributed to NetBSD: Toshiba

head.title: Organisations that have contributed to NetBSD: Toshiba

sect1.para: Toshiba has supported with loans of hardware for compatibility testing and also maintains a machine/OS compatibility database that includes details about compatibility for NetBSD on Toshiba computers.
Development work that was aided by hardware from Toshiba include:

itemizedlist.listitem: recognition of the 3COM HomeConnect Ethernet USB Adapter (3C460) and enabling the proper driver to use it
work on the cardbus driver framework
ensuring large-memory support (4GB RAM) works properly
providing a S3 Savage/MX equipped machine to enable the support for S3 Savage based cards in xsrc
adjusting cdparanoia to run on Toshiba ATAPI DVD drives
testing during development of Cirrus Logic CS4281 driver
testing and development of I2O and AMI RAID drivers

sect1.para: Please note: This information is provided on an 'as is' basis by the NetBSD project, without any express or implied warranties.
